title: Bad Spirits: Books 1-5
description: Mexico. Money. Murder.BAD SPIRITS is the first novella in the action-packed, page-turning Kate Jones Thriller SeriesÂ Kate Jones is on the run with a backpack full of money, intent on finding her way back to the United States from Mexico. Unfortunately, a ruthless drug lord named Salazar is just as intent on finding her, retrieving his stolen money, and making her pay for ever having left him. Is there anyone she can trust?
author: D.V. Berkom
